mapper.sql: num, writer, content, target_id, ref_group, comment_group, deleted, TO_CHAR(regdate,'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI') AS regdate
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_cafe_comment (num, writer, content, target_id, ref_group, comment_group, deleted, regdate) VALUES(#{num}, #{writer}, #{content}, #{target_id}, #{ref_group}, #{comment_group}, 'N', SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT FROM board_cafe_comment WHERE ref_group=#{num} ORDER BY comment_group ASC, num ASC
